0.title: Vitamin baby cleansing wipes
0.description:
Due to the presence of various vitamins and chamomile extract, Dafi's vitamin baby cleansing wipe is a suitable product for cleaning the skin of children's body and face.

  • Complete and quick removal of pollution and germs from the skin of the body and face
  • Reduces inflammation, burning and itching of the skin
  • Free of essential oil and with suitable PH and compatible with baby's skin
  • Skin softener and moisturizer
  • Antibacterial and antiallergenic
  • Free of alcohol, soap and paraben
  • It has suitable packaging for the consumption of all wipes
  • Quantity: 70 sheets

1.title: Extra slim baby cleaning wipes
1.description:
Extra slim baby wipes, an affordable product for quick and easy cleaning of children's face and body skin.

  • Heals and restores the skin
  • Relieving inflammation caused by burning urine and helping to treat it
  • It has a suitable pH and is compatible with children's delicate skin
  • Free of alcohol, soap and paraben
  • Suitable packaging for all napkins
  • Quantity: 60 sheets + 15% extra
